description: Numbers n such that n divides the (left) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 22 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A029539 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.No more terms < 7*10^6. [Lars Blomberg, Jul 25 2011]
author: Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 24 2001
extensions: Edited and updated by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 12 2002
